Class CalculatorStatServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazurmarcin.webcalculator.services.CalculatorStatServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalculatorStatService

    @Service
public class CalculatorStatServiceImpl
extends Object
implements CalculatorStatService
    Service class for managing statistics of the calculators.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
